plot: Feeling pressure from the Board of Deacons, Pastor Inqvist must decide whether to give up his annual trip to Orlando.
title: Pastor Inqvist's Trip to Orlando
plot_es: Feeling pressure from the Board of Deacons, Pastor Inqvist must decide whether to give up his annual trip to Orlando.
plot_en: Feeling pressure from the Board of Deacons, Pastor Inqvist must decide whether to give up his annual trip to Orlando.
